page.title: 09THE CARDINGTON BUS SERVICE
page.content: The bus service was founded in the 1920's for transporting animals and passengers to Shrewsbury market.The business expanded rapidly when school children from surrounding villages at 11+,needed transporting to Secondary Schools in Coalbrookdale,Shrewsbury, Church Stretton and Ludlow. We now have a fleet of 14 vehicles ranging from 12-53 seats with heaters, air-conditioning and air suspension, the most luxurious having a toilet compartment and television. School transport is still the backbone of the business but day trips,holidays and tours-both home and Continental-form a substantial part of the firm and provide employment for 20 full-time and part-time drivers.
